nodes.excerpt: Play board, card, and party games online with family and friends or gather your remote team for a fun team building activity. GameApart works with any video conference platform. New games are released monthly. Let's get this remote party started!
nodes.title: GameApart - Online board, card & party games on any video conference app
nodes.author: James Simmons

nodes.excerpt: ğŸ“ˆHireBeat for Employers is an automated interview screening platform that saves employers time ğŸ•— and moneyğŸ’°! HireBeat delivers one-way interview invitations that allow the employer to review & evaluate candidate performance anytime, anywhere.
nodes.title: HireBeat - Automated interview platform that accelerates hiring process
nodes.author: Ning Wei

nodes.excerpt: SquadPal is the app for the life of your remote/hybrid team. Through games, challenges and fun activities, SquadPal helps you create a safe space to build better connections with your teammates. Get started today, it's free for teams of up to 20 people! ğŸ”¥
nodes.title: SquadPal - Build stronger connections & have fun with your remote team
nodes.author: Nichole Elizabeth DeMerÃ©

nodes.excerpt: Distributed is a new live social chat app to help remote teams stay in sync. It started off as a jamstack demo but after spending 2-3 hours on it every day we realised it filled a huge hole in our work life as we all went remote.
nodes.title: Distributed - Stay in sync with friends, family and colleagues
nodes.author: Asim Aslam

nodes.excerpt: Dive is a platform where you can match with people from all over the world to get work done, increase sense of responsibility and motivation.
nodes.title: Dive - Write your task, match with people, get it done
nodes.author: Mert Aktas

nodes.excerpt: The app shows the UTC time in the menu bar or a Notification Center widget. This can be useful as a quick reference. You can also quickly copy the date & time in ISO8601 format. The app is free and requires macOS 11.1.
nodes.title: UTC Time - Show the time in UTC in the menu bar or a widget
nodes.author: Sindre Sorhus

nodes.excerpt: OpenReel empowers distributed enterprise, media, entertainment, and agency teams to remotely control, direct, script, film, and collaborate on high definition video projects from a mobile device or webcam in over 125 countries
nodes.title: OpenReel - Simple remote video production
nodes.author: Gabe Perez

nodes.excerpt: Virtual workplace for remote & distributed teams â€” Team Presence, Fast Video Communication, Collaboration, Live Discussion & more.
nodes.title: WTEAM - All-in-one virtual office for remote & distributed teams
nodes.author: Robleh Jama

nodes.excerpt: Have you ever wanted to search for a remote job without getting tracked, being forced to sign in, having your resume crawled, or experiencing "location bias"? Ever felt like your job search has been at the expense of your privacy? We have. And we're fixing it.
nodes.title: Remote Hill - Privacy-centric, international, remote-only job board
nodes.author: Nathan Clark

nodes.excerpt: Post.co is the best way to share big and small news across your team. Designed as a substitute for messy threads and awkward reply-all team emails, Post is a simple, low-stakes way to share team-wide updates. Great for remote teams to stay connected.
nodes.title: Post - The simplest way to post big or small news across your team.
nodes.author: Roberto Sanabria

nodes.excerpt: Better collaboration for product teams in multiple time zones. Exchange video, voice, and screen recordings with your team at the tap of a button.
nodes.title: PingPong - Video messaging for remote teams
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Perfect Recall is a free app that lets you make highlight reels from your Zoom calls simply by selecting the transcript text. Share these reels instead of written notes as engaging summaries to show â€˜what happenedâ€™.
nodes.title: Perfect Recall 2.0 - Transcribe and share clips from your Zoom calls for free
nodes.author: Kat Manalac

nodes.excerpt: Share your remote story! We are excited to introduce RemoteRated, a focused place to rate and review the remote competence, benefits, and tools of companies. Like Glassdoor, for our new remote world.
nodes.title: RemoteRated - Glassdoor for a remote world
nodes.author: Maxim Wheatley

nodes.excerpt: MeetButter is a video conferencing tool that empowers facilitators to run interactive, buttery smooth online workshops!
nodes.title: MeetButter - Workshops as smooth as butter
nodes.author: Jeffrey

nodes.excerpt: The priorities of workers are shifting. Unito compiled this toolkit to help kickstart your companyâ€™s growth in four important areas: remote work and flexible scheduling, diversity and inclusion, career growth and compensation, transparency and alignment.
nodes.title: The Better Workplace Toolkit  - Resources to help you meet the evolving needs of your team
nodes.author: Evan LePage

nodes.excerpt: Weet is a video messaging tool that allows you to have asynchronous conversations with your team, partners, and customers. Weet includes instant recording, screen sharing, virtual background, video filters, emoji reactions, and rich comment options.
nodes.title: Weet - Asynchronous video communication for remote teams
nodes.author: Matthew Howells-Barby

nodes.excerpt: Airdesk is a shared workspace that adapts to any team, whether working in the office or remotely. âœ”ï¸ The platform analyzes service data and provides real-time prioritized insights and actionable suggestions to boost the performance of any business! ğŸ“ˆ
nodes.title: Airdesk - A real-time centralized workspace for all your services
nodes.author: IgnÃ¡cio R. Correia

nodes.excerpt: Back-to-back video calls stressing you out? Give yourself (and everyone else attending your next meeting) a chance to pause by adding a 2min guided audio meditation before entering the call. Works with whatever video software you use.
nodes.title: Mindful Meetings - Add a 2min guided meditation to any video link
nodes.author: Calvin Benton

nodes.excerpt: Remote usability testing tool that supports both qualitative and quantitative research. Eye tracking, emotion recognition, heatmaps, replays, interactive polls, live sessions and much more by simply sharing a link.
nodes.title: Mupixa 2.0 - Remote usability testing, eye tracking, heatmaps, replays
nodes.author: Vladimir Daskalov

nodes.excerpt: Friday is an asynchronous platform that helps accelerate the transition to working from anywhere. Roadmap your day, stay in sync with your team, and stay connected without another meeting.
nodes.title: Friday 2.0 - Async operating system for remote work
nodes.author: Ryan Gum

nodes.excerpt: We scrapped the Likes, feed, and spammy messages to finally bring aligned professionals together meaningfully. 600+ tech leaders meet regularly through hand-curated introductions and Office Hours over video to accelerate their progress.
nodes.title: Kinetic - Meet co-founders, mentors, advisors, investors, & customers
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Take a Walk is a tool made to keep you company while you work or study. You name the place, weather, and time of day, or just leave the magic up to us. It's up to you â¤ï¸
nodes.title: Take A Walk - Go anywhere in the world while you WFH, study or just relax.
nodes.author: Mars H

nodes.excerpt: Focus on the three most important tasks every day. To be really effective you have to pick up the three most significant tasks per day. A massive productivity improvement and considered by many experts to be the best to-do strategy. Look it up!
nodes.title: 3 Things - Focus on the 3 most important things today
nodes.author: Marta

nodes.excerpt: Panther helps startups employ people in 160+ countries without having to set up foreign subsidiaries. We automate global compliance, payroll, taxes, and benefits, so you can build a world-class remote team without losing focus of your company's growth ğŸš€
nodes.title: Panther - Global employment for remote teams
